quote: He who every morning plans the transactions of that day and follows that plan carries a thread that will guide him through the labyrinth of the most busy life.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: Nothing is ours except time.
author: Geothe

quote: Time is money.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: You delay, by time will not.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Time lost is never found again.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: It’s better to do the right thing slowly than the wrong thing quickly.
author: Peter Turla

quote: The bad news is time flies. The good news is you’re the pilot.
author: Michael Altshuler

quote: All the flowers of all of the tomorrows are in the seeds of today.
author: Chinese Proverb

quote: Take a rest. A field that has rested yields a beautiful crop.
author: Roman poet Ovid

quote: Better three hours too soon, than one minute too late.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: The key is in not spending time, but in investing it.
author: Stephen R. Covey

quote: Make use of time, let not advantage slip.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Take care of the minutes and the hours will take care of themselves.
author: Lord Chesterfield

quote: You’re writing the story of your life one moment at a time.
author: Doc Childre and Howard Martin

quote: To do two things at once is to do neither.
author: Publius Syrus

quote: Never let yesterday use up today.
author: Richard H. Nelson

quote: The time for action is now. It’s never too late to do something.
author: Carl Sandburg

quote: Lost time is never found again.
author: Proverb

quote: To think too long about doing a thing often becomes its undoing.
author: Eva Young

quote: Never leave ‘till tomorrow which you can do today.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Dont’ cry because it’s over, smile because it happened.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote:
You’ve gotta dance like there’s nobody watching,
Love like you’ll never be hurt,
Sing like there’s nobody listening,
And live like it’s heaven on earth.
author: William W. Purkey

quote: To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: It’s better to be hated for what you are than to be loved for what you are not.
author: André Gide

quote: There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. Th other is as although evert thing is a miracle.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Good friends, good books, and a sleepy conscience: this is the ideal life.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Sometimes the questions are complicated and the answers are simple.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: Today you are You, that is truer than true. There is no one alive who is Youer than You
author: Dr. Seuss

quote:
Sometimes people are beautiful.
Not in looks.
Not in what they say.
Just in what they are.
author: Markus Zusak

quote: In the end, it’s not going to matter how many breaths you took, but how many moments took your breath away.
author: Shing Xiong

quote: Be who you are and say what you feel because those who mind don’t matter and those who matter don’t mind.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: I don’t regret the things I’ve done, I regret the things I didn’t do when I had the change.
author: Joshua J, Marine

quote: One of the most important keys to success is having the discipline to do what you know you should do, even when you don’t feel like doing it.
author: Unknown

quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do, If you haven’t found it yet, keep looking.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Love is short, live it. Love is rare, grab it. Anger is bad, dump it. Fear is awful, face it. Memories are sweet, cherish it.
author: Unknown

quote: Deciding what not to do is as important as deciding what to do.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Let’s go invent tomorrow instead of worrying about what happened yesterday.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Stay hungry. Stay foolish.
author: Steve Jobs
